alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 8:12AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Geneva, northwestern Bay, Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties through 845 AM EDT/745 AM CDT/... At 812 AM EDT/712 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base to 12 miles south of De Funiak Springs to 9 miles southeast of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Chipley, Hartford, Slocomb, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Malvern, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Westville and Ebro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
